page.title: 20A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: I get up at 7.45 am.when I am going to school.Before I have my breakfast I watch either TVam.or a video film.Then I get washed and dressed.If I have the time I play some records before going out to catch the school mini-bus,which I wait for by Tiverton Hall Farm. When I get to{school}I play in the yard with my friends until the whistle goes.We collect our hymn books,then go into the hall for{assembly.}After this we do{Maths}or{English}until playtime. Then we do more work until dinner time In the afternoons we do{topic work, art,craft,games or write about one of the television programmes we have watched. School finishes at 3.40pm. and when I get home I play with my friend John until tea-time.After tea I sometimes play again or I watch the television until it is time for bed.
